GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
cgroup: cgroup_get_from_id() must check the looked-up kn is a directory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 1e9571887f97b17cf3ffe9aa4da89090ea60988b, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 6b658c4863c15936872a93c9ee879043bf6393c9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cgroup: cgroup_get_from_id() must check the looked-up kn is a directory
